column5: Got out with the good folks at Cag for their spring carp-in. Tough bite today with the colder water temps. Figure the season is 2-3 weeks behind. Even so, a few fish were landed. Even the peanut and I managed one for the team.   Despite the poor bite, I was in great company. In all a thoroughly enjoyable day.
it's always nice to be on the bank, especially with good company. Nice work.  Usually get some pretty good sized fish at that spot, probably just need some warmer temps.
Its always I great day when the bite alarms go off. Your post is making me get the itch.  Carper

The day did start out rainy but the afternoon was a lot nicer. It was a great day and I enjoyed your company immensely . With the water temp still only 48o F the bite was slow for sure. I did get to see a decent pike landed on a fly rod, that was an bonus. As usual with our fish-ins we get people popping by to fish a bit during the day or just to say hi. All are welcome.
